bodyPart.description: Kinetic chain from shoulder to wrist, so focus on all those muscles with these exercises. For strengthening exercises, 3-5 lb weight may be useful. Focus on high reps, rather than high weight.

childrenExerciseMyofascial.title: Myofascial Release
childrenExerciseMyofascial.description: 3 x 30 sec. Use specialized tool, your fingers, or two tennis balls taped together. Roll along any part of arm that is tender.

childrenExerciseStretching.title: Wrist Flexion (in pronation and supination)
childrenExerciseStretching.description: 3 x 30-45 sec each. Can also perform with bent elbow if feeling too much strain on bicep.

childrenExerciseStretching.title: Wrist Extension (in supination and pronation)
childrenExerciseStretching.description: 3 x 30-45 sec each. Can also perform with bent elbow if feeling too much strain on bicep.

childrenExerciseStretching.title: Wrist Pronation and Supination
childrenExerciseStretching.description: 3 x 30-45 sec each. Perform with dowel or PVC pipe. Stablize elbow against side of body.

childrenExerciseStretching.title: Overhead Triceps Stretch
childrenExerciseStretching.description: 3 x 30-45 sec each. Keep core engaged and don't lean to the side.

childrenExerciseStrengthening.title: Bicep Curls
childrenExerciseStrengthening.description: 3 x 12-20 each. Maintain neutral elbow in supination throughout the motion.

childrenExerciseStrengthening.title: Brachialis Curl
childrenExerciseStrengthening.description: 3 x 12-20 each. Maintain neutral elbow in pronation throughout the motion.

childrenExerciseStrengthening.title: Tricep Kickback
childrenExerciseStrengthening.description: 3 x 12-20 each. Bend over, keep flat back and forearm stabilized along side of body.

childrenExerciseStrengthening.title: Wrist Pronation and Supination
childrenExerciseStrengthening.description: 3 x 10-15 each. Perform on table or otherwise stabilize the arm.

childrenExerciseStrengthening.title: Stabilizing Hold
childrenExerciseStrengthening.description: 3 x 30-45 sec each. Arm extended with elbow slightly bent.
